items.title: Obama to Adapt an SA Cosby Book And More BIPOC Literature News
items.description: This week's news has everything from the best books out in August to a story about a Black cultural haven in Pennsylvania.

items.title: The Most-Anticipated Read Harder Challenge Books Out in the Rest of 2025
items.description: Here are just a few of the most exciting new releases coming out by the end of the year that check off 2025 Read Harder Challenge tasks!

items.title: 2025 Mystery Books: Time Loop & Time Travel Edition!
items.description: These time loop and time travel mysteries are proof that sometimes all you need to solve a murder is a little more time!

items.title: “Goonies Never Say Die!” Celebrate 40 Years of The Goonies With These Middle Grade Books
items.description: You'll find treasure hunting escapades, intriguing mysteries, '80s vibes, and heartfelt themes in these middle grade books like The Goonies.

items.title: Romantic Beach Reads that Are Actually Set at the Beach
items.description: Not all beach reads take place at the beach, but thee do! These romantic beach reads set at the beach are perfect for end of summer.
